Articles.Content:
Fed up with all those success ? All those Kerbonauts who achieve this or that ?
So I am !
Welcome to catastrophic failures, hilarious stupidity and astoundingly stupid judgment.

Heard about the Darwin Award ?
For the puny humans it is a price awarded to all those who contribute to enhance the human gene pool by taking themselves out of it in sublimely idiotic fashion.

For Kerbal ?
It is a price awarded to all kerbaunots who pave the way to the stars by crashing themselves in the most stupid possible way.

With a few quirks :
The crash had to be unintended.
Pilot must be dead - if you can walk away it's a landing, not a crash.
Astoundingly stupid judgment : you could have avoided all that, but sure, it would never happen to you :p

Hi there @Coyotitos

...this is a great challenge, i will document my future fails for this thread!  There are truely horrible explosions happening in my space program...

Edited October 24, 2023 by Mikki
you guess it typo
I’m just going to leave this right here, as you can guess by the series title why…
